basics.name: Rexon A. De los Reyes
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: A web developer that follows the basic SOLID principles, specialized in building web applications, has experienced in web based accounting systems and other e-commerce solutions, also has basic knowledge in building Mobile applications using Apache Cordova, Ionic framework and AngularJs. Technologies uses on a daily basis include PHP - Laravel and Codeigniter, Javascript, AngularJs, and JQuery, MySQL, HTML, CSS - Bootstrap and Foundation and Materialize. Loved to share ideas and any new found knowledge and still learning new things.

location.address: Visitacion St. Sambag II, Cebu City

about.sayWhat: As a developer it is my responsibility to take care about security and the  maintainability of web applications.
Music is pain reliever, ~ I really love to play guitar, and listen to punk and deathcore musics.
Skateboarding is life, ~ I really want to play skateboard every after end my duty.
Like other people in the web world, I am also a coffee addict(dang shit)
If I were not in a web industries, I'd secretly want to be a chef.
I really like to dribble rather than shooting the ball into the basket.
Photography in the skate scene is one of my desire someday.

work.summary: Develop new features and functionalities for existing full stack Javascript web applications, refactor codes into more maintainable system structure, develop few reusable services for the application needs, enhancing user interface into more responsive web applications.
Develop and  enhance web and mobile apps (Using Apache Cordova), Maintain applications into more secure, sustainable 	and maintainable web  applications.
Maintain an existing Japan Based Websites, Develop or enhancing static websites into more dynamic websites.
Involve in some projects like web-based accounting system, order management system and other e-commerce systems.

education.institution: University of Visayas - Toledo City Campus

publications.name: AngularJs String Helper
publications.summary: Just a simple lightweight angularjs string helper that maybe helps with filters.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
